name: Sahil Kohli
title: Director
bio: Director at Tiger Analytics with 14 years of experience leading large-scale digital transformation programs for clients such as Walmart, Disney, Pfizer, Macy's, and McDonald's.

name: Rajat Kohli
title: Sales Leader
bio: Sales leader at Google with 12+ years in product management and enterprise sales, previously driving growth at Adobe and Google.

name: Raj Kumar
title: Digital Transformation Expert
bio: 20+ years of expertise at Accenture and Capgemini in digital transformation and data engineering for Fortune-500 clients in Sweden and beyond.

name: Akhil K.
title: Analytics & BI Solutions Architect
bio: 15+ years delivering analytics and BI solutions at Microsoft, Walmart, and Nielsen, specializing in scalable data platforms.

name: Nitin D.
title: Generative AI & BI Architect
bio: Generative AI & BI architect with 15 years of experience; currently shaping AI-driven analytics at Red Hat and Tiger Analytics.

name: Nimisha Sainani
title: Founder
bio: Founder of The Quiet Reset with 13+ years scaling startups across India and the U.S., expert in growth strategy and organizational development.
